long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drive Links Generator creates a Google Doc in your current folder. It presents each file and folder as a clickable link, based on the file name, that can be easily copied and pasted into websites, emails, and more. It only works for the root folder if you are in the My Drive view, not the home view.

This saves time and simplifies sharing folder contents with colleagues or team members, making it invaluable for project management and digital asset organization. The extension integrates seamlessly into your Google Drive interface, requiring no additional software or complex setups.

With Drive Links Generator, you can experience a new level of efficiency and organization in managing and sharing your digital files and transform how you access and share your Google Drive folders.
